name: Seirei
description:
It is a first-person game that uses a keyboard and mouse.
You have to approach the enemy's field of view. After succeeding in capturing the enemy, cleanse through consciousness.
Attract enemies using ropes to drag them, or show your appearance to attract the enemy.


*Binding yourself or someone else is dangerous.
Do not follow the game if you find a patient who is crazy in the real world.
For your safety, do not play this game if you are a minor.
*All characters are over the age of 18
